code: import React,{useState}from"react";import TodoList from"./TodoList";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function Home(){const[tasks,setTasks]=useState([]);const addTask=task=>{setTasks([...tasks,{id:Date.now(),text:task}]);};const deleteTask=id=>{setTasks(tasks.filter(task=>task.id!==id));};const clearTasks=()=>{setTasks([]);};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"Home"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",id:"todoInput",placeholder:"Add a new task...",onKeyDown:e=>{if(e.key==="Enter"&&e.target.value.trim()){addTask(e.target.value.trim());e.target.value="";}}}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:()=>{const input=document.getElementById("todoInput");if(input.value.trim()){addTask(input.value.trim());input.value="";}},children:"Add"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:clearTasks,children:"Clear List"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(TodoList,{tasks:tasks,onDelete:deleteTask})]});}export default Home;
